dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...I'm just, like, a bit lost on why this whole Saudi CSR thing is, uh, getting so much buzz, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...I'm just, like, a bit lost on why this whole Saudi C S R thing is, uh, getting so much buzz, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Host_A, it's actually, um, a pretty huge development in sustainable practices globally. The Minister, Ahmad Al-Rajhi, he's talking about a world-class platform.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Host_A, it's actually, um, a pretty huge development in sustainable practices globally. The Minister, Ahmad Al-Rajhi, he's talking about a world-class platform.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the opening of the Forum, Saudi Minister of Human Resources and Social Development, Ahmad Al-Rajhi highlighted Saudi Arabias vision to establish a world-class platform for social responsibility dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A world-class platform? But for what, exactly? I thought their Vision 2030 was already, like, super ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A world-class platform? But for what, exactly? I thought their Vision twenty thirty was already, like, super ambitious.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it really is. But they're saying they're not just meeting targets, they're, uh, exceeding them, like, setting a whole new bar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it really is. But they're saying they're not just meeting targets, they're, uh, exceeding them, like, setting a whole new bar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exceeding them? How do you even, um, measure that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exceeding them? How do you even, um, measure that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, for one thing, private sector engagement. Corporate social responsibility spending jumped from just over one percent in 2019 to, like, over four percent by last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, for one thing, private sector engagement. Corporate social responsibility spending jumped from just over one percent in twenty nineteen to, like, over four percent by last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These contributions to social spending jumped from 1.19% in 2019 to 4.15% by the end of 2023, while the percentage of large companies with CSR programs jumped from 30% to 65% during the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. That's a, uh, a big jump. So more companies are, like, actually doing this stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's a, uh, a big jump. So more companies are, like, actually doing this stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Large companies with CSR programs went from thirty percent to sixty-five percent in that same period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Large companies with C S R programs went from thirty percent to sixty-five percent in that same period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: while the percentage of large companies with CSR programs jumped from 30% to 65% during the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so that's impressive. But what about, um, globally? Like, where do they stand?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so that's impressive. But what about, um, globally? Like, where do they stand?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's the really wild part, Host_A. They shot up from 41st in 2021 to 16th in the IMD World Competitiveness Yearbook's Social Responsibility Index.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the really wild part, Host_A. They shot up from forty first in twenty twenty one to sixteenth in the I M D World Competitiveness Yearbook's Social Responsibility Index.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This progress is reflected in Saudi Arabia's improved global ranking, climbing to 16th place in the IMD World Competitiveness Yearbook 2024's Social Responsibility Index, up from 41st in 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, 41st to 16th in, like, three years? That's, um, fast. Are they aiming higher?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, forty first to sixteenth in, like, three years? That's, um, fast. Are they aiming higher?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. They're actually expecting to hit the top ten by the next ranking. McKinsey analysis even said they're a world leader in sustainable practices now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. They're actually expecting to hit the top ten by the next ranking. McKinsey analysis even said they're a world leader in sustainable practices now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Minister was confident that Saudi Arabia will be even more highly rated among the top CSR countries in the world by 2030.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A world leader? That feels, uh, really quick. What are they doing to make it happen?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A world leader? That feels, uh, really quick. What are they doing to make it happen?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A bunch of things. New government grants for companies doing green stuff, you know, integrating recycling, circular economy principles, sustainable digitization.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A bunch of things. New government grants for companies doing green stuff, you know, integrating recycling, circular economy principles, sustainable digitization.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Al-Rajhi outlined the evolution of corporate social responsibility, emphasizing its increasing focus on innovation, sustainable digitization, and strategic transformation. He underlined the growing trend of companies integrating technology, recycling, and circular economy principles into their daily operations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, tech and stuff? Like, carbon capture? I heard that's a big thing over there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, tech and stuff? Like, carbon capture? I heard that's a big thing over there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Carbon capture, advanced hydrogen fuel cells... they're really pushing innovation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Carbon capture, advanced hydrogen fuel cells... they're really pushing innovation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, what about the private sector role? I mean, beyond just the spending.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, what about the private sector role? I mean, beyond just the spending.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're crucial. The minister stressed their vital role, and they've even got a dedicated social responsibility committee, a national strategy, a platform for transparency.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're crucial. The minister stressed their vital role, and they've even got a dedicated social responsibility committee, a national strategy, a platform for transparency.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Minister concluded by recognizing the private sector's vital role in creating a better world. ... These include the formation of a dedicated social responsibility committee, the creation of a national strategy, and the launch of a national platform to drive transparency in social responsibility reporting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So it's, like, a national effort, not just individual companies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's, like, a national effort, not just individual companies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they even made March 23rd 'Social Responsibility Day' to showcase private sector efforts. It's a whole, uh, national incentive program.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they even made March twenty third 'Social Responsibility Day' to showcase private sector efforts. It's a whole, uh, national incentive program.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Furthermore, the Kingdom has declared March 23rd as Social Responsibility Day to showcase private sector efforts issued guidance for companies, developed a social responsibility index for the Saudi market, and fostered a shared national identity for social responsibility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. That's, um, way more comprehensive than I thought. So it's not just talk, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's, um, way more comprehensive than I thought. So it's not just talk, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely not. They're really trying to make it a, like, core component of their international commitments. Itâ€™s quite the transformation story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely not. They're really trying to make it a, like, core component of their international commitments. It's quite the transformation story.
